Structs/ForumListData.html#/s:3App13Foru.abstract: The last user to post to the forum. Nil if there are no posts in the forum.

Structs/ForumListData.html#/s:3App13Foru.abstract: If this forum is for an Event on the schedule, the timezone that the ship is going to be in when the event occurs. Delivered as an abbreviation e.g. “EST”.

Structs/ForumListData.html#/s:3App13Foru.name: eventID

Structs/FezPostData.html#/s:3App11FezPos.abstract: The image content of the fez post.

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.abstract: The users on a waiting list for the fez.

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.name: postCount
Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.abstract: How many posts the user can see in the fez. The count is returned even for calls that don’t return the actual posts, but is not returned for

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.name: readCount
Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.abstract: How many posts the user has read. If postCount > readCount, there’s posts to be read. UI can also use readCount to set the initial view

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.name: paginator
Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.abstract: Paginates the array in posts–gives the start and limit of the returned posts array relative to all the posts in the thread.

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.name: posts
Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html#/s:.abstract: The FezPosts in the fez discussion. Methods that return arrays of Fezzes, or that add or remove users, do not populate this field (it will be nil).

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV8ti.name: timeZone
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV8ti.abstract: The 3 letter abbreviation for the active time zone at the time and place where the fez is happening.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV16p.name: participantCount
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV16p.abstract: How many users are currently members of the fez. Can be larger than maxParticipants; which indicates a waitlist.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV15m.name: minParticipants
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV15m.abstract: The min number of people for the activity. Set by the host. Fezzes may?? auto-cancel if the minimum participant count isn’t met when the fez is scheduled to start.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV15m.name: maxParticipants
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV15m.abstract: The max number of people for the activity. Set by the host.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV9ca.name: cancelled
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV9ca.abstract: TRUE if the fez has been cancelled by the owner. Cancelled fezzes should display CANCELLED so users know not to show up, but cancelled fezzes are not deleted.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV20l.name: lastModificationTime
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV20l.abstract: The most recent of: Creation time for the fez, time of the last post (may not exactly match post time), user add/remove, or update to fezzes’ fields.

Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html.name: MembersOnlyData
Structs/FezData/MembersOnlyData.html.abstract: FezData.MembersOnlyData returns data only available to participants in a Fez.

Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV7me.name: members
Structs/FezData.html#/s:3App7FezDataV7me.abstract: Will be nil if user is not a member of the fez (in the participant or waiting lists).

Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.name: eventID
Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.abstract: The event’s ID. This is the Swiftarr database record for this event.

Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.name: uid
Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.abstract: The event’s UID. This is the VCALENDAR/ICS File/sched.com identifier for this event–what calendar software uses to correllate whether 2 events are the same event.

Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.name: timeZone
Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.abstract: The timezone that the ship is going to be in when the event occurs. Delivered as an abbreviation e.g. “EST”.

Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.name: lastUpdateTime
Structs/EventData.html#/s:3App9EventData.abstract: The last time data for this event was modified. Used for change management.

Structs/CurrentUserData.html#/s:3App15Cu.name: isLoggedIn
Structs/CurrentUserData.html#/s:3App15Cu.abstract: Whether the user is currently logged in.

Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.name: isRestricted
Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.abstract: If TRUE, the user cannot create/modify threads in this forum. Should be sorted to top of category list.

Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.name: isEventCategory
Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.abstract: if TRUE, this category is for Event Forums, and is prepopulated with forum threads for each Schedule Event.

Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.name: numThreads
Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.abstract: The number of threads in this category

Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.name: forumThreads
Structs/CategoryData.html#/s:3App12Categ.abstract: The threads in the category. Only populated for /categories/ID.

Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.name: totalGames
Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.abstract: How many games are in the result set. If the request included a filter, this value will contain the total number of games that match the filter.

Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.name: start
Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.abstract: The initial offset into the resultSet array. 0 based.

Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.name: limit
Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html#/s:3A.abstract: How many results are to be returned.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: numCopies
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: How many copies are being brought aboard.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: donatedBy
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: Some games each year are loaned to the library by specific people.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: notes
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: Any notes on the game (specific printing, wear and tear)

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: suggestedPlayers
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: From BGG’s API. This is the value from the “numPlayers” poll that got the highest number of “Best” votes.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: minAge
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: From BGG’s API. Suggested min player age in years. Min age could be determined by complexity or content.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: numRatings
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: From BGG’s API. How many BGG reviewers submitted ratings.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: avgRating
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: From BGG’s API. Average game rating. Members can rate games with scores in the range 1…10

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: complexity
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: From BGG’s API. Members can score a games’ complexity on a scale of 1…5, where 1 is Light and 5 is Heavy.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: isExpansion
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: TRUE if this entry is an expansion for another game. Weirdly, the games library may not actually have the base game.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: hasExpansions
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: TRUE if this game has expansions that can be played with it.

Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.name: isFavorite
Structs/BoardgameData.html#/s:3App13Boar.abstract: TRUE if the user has favorited the game. FALSE if no one is logged in.

Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.name: id
Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.abstract: Only THO and admins need to send Announcement IDs back to the API (to modify or delete announcements, for example), but caching clients can still use the ID

Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.name: displayUntil
Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.abstract: Announcements are considered ‘active’ until this time. After this time, GET /api/v3/notification/announcements will no longer return the announcement,

Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.name: isDeleted
Structs/AnnouncementData.html#/s:3App16A.abstract: TRUE if the announcement has been deleted. Only THO/admins can fetch deleted announcements; will always be FALSE for other users.

Structs/AddedUserData.html.name: AddedUserData
Structs/AddedUserData.html.abstract: Used to return a newly created sub-account’s ID and username.

Structs/AnnouncementData.html.name: AnnouncementData
Structs/AnnouncementData.html.abstract: An announcement to display to all users.

Structs/BoardgameData.html.name: BoardgameData
Structs/BoardgameData.html.abstract: Used to obtain a list of board games.

Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html.name: BoardgameResponseData
Structs/BoardgameResponseData.html.abstract: Wraps an array of BoardgameData with info needed to paginate the result set.

Structs/CategoryData.html.name: CategoryData
Structs/CategoryData.html.abstract: Used to return the ID and title of a Category.

Structs/CreatedUserData.html.name: CreatedUserData
Structs/CreatedUserData.html.abstract: Used to return a newly created account’s ID, username and recovery key.

Structs/CurrentUserData.html.name: CurrentUserData
Structs/CurrentUserData.html.abstract: Used to obtain the current user’s ID, username and logged-in status.

Structs/ForumData.html.name: ForumData
Structs/ForumData.html.abstract: Used to return the contents of a Forum.

Structs/ForumListData.html.name: ForumListData
Structs/ForumListData.html.abstract: Used to return the ID, title and status of a Forum.

Structs/NoteData.html.name: NoteData
Structs/NoteData.html.abstract: Used to obtain the contents of a UserNote for display in a non-profile-viewing context.

Structs/PostDetailData.html.name: PostDetailData
Structs/PostDetailData.html.abstract: Used to return a ForumPost‘s data with full user LikeType info.

Structs/ProfilePublicData.html.name: ProfilePublicData
Structs/ProfilePublicData.html.abstract: Used to return a user’s public profile contents. For viewing/editing a user’s own profile, see UserProfileData.

Structs/TokenStringData.html.name: TokenStringData
Structs/TokenStringData.html.abstract: Used to return a token string for use in HTTP Bearer Authentication.

Structs/TwarrtDetailData.html.name: TwarrtDetailData
